channel.title: Need help!
channel.description: ok well im thinking to start my own server well i need some details first ok....first i need to know if it cost any money then i need to know if this is good for a first server..................................................tbh i just need any tips i can get on creating a server..so please post!!!!

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @paratodus paratodus
item.description:
@paratodus wrote:

I plan on getting a dedicated server if it will save my internet from going slow im good i have trouble i feel this might take a year to make a change to my server unless it takes three years to make one then ill eventually give up…but ill try until i run out of cash!

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @paratodus paratodus
item.description:
@paratodus wrote:

no not really…that’s why i need help im kinda stupid but im willing to learn lol ill find out what it is…if this is it tell me Port forwarding, sometimes referred to as port mapping,[1] is the act of forwarding a network port from one network node to another. This technique can allow an external user to reach a port on a private IP address (inside a LAN) from the outside via a NAT-enabled router.[2]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!

item.description:
@t_a_i_n_t wrote:

First off no it doesnt cost any money, unless wanting a 24/7 server.

Second what computer do you have?

Do you know how to portforward?

ill be willing to help you.

Read full topic
